section.docs: Todos can be about many things. The server will associate contacts depending on what the todo is about. Todos can have attachments and comments. They may also have reminders. Todos also represent an item on a call list. All in All, todos are the workhorse.

section.title: Format
section.docs:
kind
Required
One of: call, general, support
description
Text describing what todo
finish_by
Time this todo should be done by
call_list
ID of call list
campaign
ID of associated campaign
reference
ID & type of associated resource
contacts
IDs of all associated contacts
comments
See comments section
user
ID of the responsible user
### Changing Associations You can change the user by setting the `user_id` attribute.
